[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1606801998777{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Offerings” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1596701826260{margin-top: 30px !important;}” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1594301405228{padding-top: 10px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Digital Marketing

Digital Marketing is an essential ingredient for success for businesses around the world.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Web Development

Great website experience builds great brands. We Craft Beautiful Websites from Palm to Desktop.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Consultancy

Build your digital future! With your own digital consultant who increases your customer base and sales.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Training

We provide online Digital Marketing training conducted by industry experts.
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” bg_type=”bg_color” bg_override=”ex-full” bg_color_value=”#f9f9f9″][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator color=”black”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Upcoming Training” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1594442725773{padding-top: 10px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

1 Day workshop on Google Search Ads(SEM)

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

1 Day workshop on Google Ads(Advance)

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

1 Day workshop on Facebook and Instagram Marketing

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

1 Day workshop on Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager Basic

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

1 Day workshop on Facebook(Advance)

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Complete Digital Marketing Course

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” bg_type=”bg_color” bg_override=”ex-full” css=”.vc_custom_1598620790220{padding-top: 50px !important;}” bg_color_value=”#ffffff”][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”wide-box-mobile”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”home-box1-mobile” width=”3/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1474449999574{padding-right: 50px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Lead Generation using Digital Marketing” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:26px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_separator color=”black” align=”align_left” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1610967580110{padding-top: 10px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

Generate leads through our Digital marketing services & social media marketing services with top channels like Facebook, Linkedin, Instagram, etc. Get more and more leads delivered at a low cost.

We specialize in Lead generations For:

  1. Educational Institutes/ University
  2. Manufacturing Industries
  3. Health care Industries

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”wide-box-mobile”][vc_single_image image=”10739″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_type=”bg_color” bg_override=”ex-full” css=”.vc_custom_1594217529738{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}” bg_color_value=”#303540″][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Approach” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1596701856129{margin-top: 30px !important;}” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”white” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1594218402037{padding-top: 10px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top” seperator_enable=”seperator_enable_value” seperator_type=”xlarge_triangle_seperator” seperator_position=”bottom_seperator” seperator_shape_background=”#ffffff” el_class=”adjust-boxes-on-mobile”][vc_column width=”1/4″]

[vc_icon type=”openiconic” icon_openiconic=”vc-oi vc-oi-search” color=”custom” size=”lg” align=”center” custom_color=”#f08324″][vc_custom_heading text=”Analyze” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

We analyse your current market plan and the market scenario for your industry. We do a preliminary analysis of your competitors as well before drawing a plan. We basically do a detailed audit of your business.

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]
[vc_icon type=”openiconic” icon_openiconic=”vc-oi vc-oi-target” color=”custom” size=”lg” align=”center” custom_color=”#f08324″][vc_custom_heading text=”Strategize” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

A well-planned strategy is built based on this analysis. We work together to build up a strategy within your budget and practical to achieve. During this phase, we also build up a high-level execution plan.

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]
[vc_icon type=”typicons” icon_typicons=”typcn typcn-heart-full-outline” color=”custom” size=”lg” align=”center” custom_color=”#f08324″][vc_custom_heading text=”Execute” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

Based on the planning, the execution begins. Campaigns are designed and executed based on the ongoing market trends.

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]
[vc_icon type=”entypo” icon_entypo=”entypo-icon entypo-icon-feather” color=”custom” size=”lg” align=”center” custom_color=”#f08324″][vc_custom_heading text=”Improvise” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

Marketing is a continuous process hence we constantly monitor the campaigns and improvise it time and again to optimise the results.

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” bg_type=”bg_color” bg_override=”ex-full” css=”.vc_custom_1594360289172{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” bg_color_value=”__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1594360300042{background-color: __USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__ !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”We are one of the best digital marketing agencies that amaze customers with impactful results and impress them with our customer service.” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.5″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”counter-text”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1594360307914{background-color: __USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__ !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Why Choose Digital Consulting Pandit as Your Digital Marketing Agency?

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1594301405228{padding-top: 10px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

We have Proven Results

We have served across various industries and met our client’s expectations.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

We are Honest & Ethical

We believe in honesty, integrity, and respecting our clients.
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

We put Customers First

Put our client first — and deliver the experience they expect
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Transparency & Clean reporting

No worry about the confidential data you share with us
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Cost-Effective

For the quality of work we provide, we surely are budget-friendly!!
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Performance Focus

We converse numbers & results that matter to you
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” parallax=”content-moving-fade” parallax_image=”8403″ disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1594360654842{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ el_class=”wide-testimonials-mobile”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_custom_heading text=”What our clients say about us” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:32px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”]
  • Ravi P.

    Unique approach!! I became an expert in course of working with them.

  • Fenil Maisheri, CEO Niral BI

    I would Strongly recommend Digital marketing consultancy for every entrepreneur. In depth knowledge & Cost effective solutions provided by Digital Consulting Pandit team worked wonders for us.

  • Vijay J., CEO Nihira Infotech Pvt. ltd

    Nice and easy way of Digital Marketing that we never thought of.
